column4: why not just get on ubuntu and come back.  It's pretty hard to help you otherwise
I don't have to "come back" if I want to run ubuntu
aren't you asking how to get dvd css to work and you installed the package and it still does not work?
you need to get on ubuntu, how else can we troubleshoot?
ok.  So now describe what happens when you put in a dvd
if I play in mplayer, then there is some sound, but jerky, and now video
did you try a different dvd?
and again, sound, but no video?
try to play nice.  People are only trying to help
